item.title: Tools Guide
item.description: GitHub account First, you will need to create a GitHub account here. If you already have one, you can use your existing account. Sireum Logika In CIS 301, we will use a tool called Logika, which is a verifier and a proof checker for propositional, predicate, and programming logic. You will need to install the VS Code-based Sireum IVE (Integrated Verification Environment), which contains Logika. Getting Installer Script Go here under “For CIS 301 Fall 2025” to install Logika.

item.title: git Install
item.description: Verify a git install You will likely already have a command-line version of git installed on your machine. To check, open a folder in VS Code, display the integrated terminal, and type: git --version You should see a version number printing out. If you see that, git is already installed. If you see an error that git is unrecognized, then you will need to install it. Go here to download and install the latest version.
